full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,STON PA DUS KYI 'KHOR LO RJE RIN PO CHE SOGS BLA MA RNAMS LA GSOL 'DEBS CING 'DOD BYA'I DON LA SMON PA DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG DNGOS GRUB DPAL STER CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES STON PA DUS KYI 'KHOR LO, RJE RIN PO CHE SOGS BLA MA RNAMS LA GSOL BA 'DEBS CING 'DOD BYA'I DON LA SMON PA DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG DNGOS GRUB DPAL STER CES BYA BA 'DI YANG, 'O YUG 'O BRAN DPAL GYI DBANG PHYUG GI GDUNG DU KHAL KHA RJE BTZUN DAM PA'I GSOL DPON T'A BLA MA AACHI THU DAR HANG THO YON BLO BZANG DKON MCHOG NAS, STON PA, DUS KYI 'KHOR LO, @010B RJE RIN PO CHE, RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA, SKYABS MGON RJE BTZUN DAM PA, LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE, RGYAL SRAS RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO SNYOMS LAS DED SOGS BLA MA RNAMS LA GSOL 'DEBS SHING, KHYAD PAR RGYAL SRAS RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO'I BKA' DRIN DRAN PA'I GSOL 'DEBS ZHABS BRTAN, RJES 'DZIN SMON LAM DANG 'BREL BA, GZHAN YANG THUN MONG PA DANG THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I DUS KYI 'KHOR LO RIM GNYIS LAM GYI GSOL 'DEBS 'BREL LDAN RNAMS TSE RING CHAS MTHUN TSE DPAL RGYAS SHING, PHYI MA SHAMBHA LA YI ZHING DU SKYES PA'I KHYAD PAR RIGS LDAN THAG PO 'KHOR LO @011A *, ,CAN GYI 'KHOR GYI THOG MAR SKYES TE RANG BZHIN DON GNYIS LHUN GYIS GRUB PA DANG, SANGS RGYAS BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA SOGS GONG SMRAS DON MTSANG BA'I 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES, RGYAL SRAS RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO LCAGS RTZOM BSKUL MA ZHUS PAR, DE NAS RTZAM NA LEGS PA'I BKA' PHEBS TSUL DANG BCAS PA, MAndAL DANG, LHA RDZAS DRI BRAL GYI RTEN BCAS PA'I 'PHRIN YIG LAM NAS BSKUL BA MDZAD PA LTAR, BKA' DRIN GSUM LDAN RGYAL SRAS RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO SOGS DAM PA RNAMS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS LEN PA'O, ,@011B ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG SNYOMS LAS BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG GIS ,RANG GI BSAM GTAN GYI BSTI GNAS DGE 'PHEL BYANG CHUB GLING DU SMON 'DUN MTSAMS SBYOR BZANG PO BRIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
